dataList.title: Tingtang Boss
dataList.content: Okay, one at a time, one at a time~
The child’s hands and feet were too quick for the eyes to follow.

dataList.title: Tingtang Boss
dataList.content: Ah~ You there, slacker~ I’ll carve out your skull if you keep half-assing your swing~

dataList.title: Tingtang Gang
dataList.content: Yessir! Sorry, sir!
The child makes sure to check on his subordinates even as his hands are occupied.

dataList.title: Tingtang Boss
dataList.content: Alright, alright. So, what are you here for again?
The child questioned the trespassers on his turf. His hands didn’t neglect to cut down approaching foes as he spoke.
Urgh… The—The car pagoda…

dataList.title: Tingtang Boss
dataList.content: The pagodas? What about them?
The rumors… about J Corp…

dataList.title: Tingtang Boss
dataList.content: …Umm~ Anyone know what this guy’s talking about?
The child apathetically asked his men for an explanation. One of them was quick to fill him in.

dataList.title: Tingtang Gang
dataList.content: I-I’d guess it’s about… the, err, wheel of fortune thing, boss.

dataList.title: Tingtang Boss
dataList.content: The wheel of fortune…? Like, the one in those tarot cards?
The child turned to the invaders, his biggest question still unanswered.

dataList.title: Tingtang Boss
dataList.content: Why would you look for it in our turf?
…The wheels.

dataList.title: Tingtang Boss
dataList.content: Eh?
…Cars… have… lots of them…
The child’s eyes narrowed, and soon crumpled into an annoyed frown.
Then…

dataList.title: Tingtang Boss
dataList.content: That’s rather anticlimactic… How about you all just die?
He declared with an icy voice while gripping his dagger.
